title: FFT
description: Implementation of https://dl.acm.org/doi/10.5555/1789574.1789615 proudly provided by members of the HPI AKITA project.
authors: Faraz Rasheed, Peter Peng, Reda Alhajj, Jon Rokne

parameters.name: fft_parameters
parameters.description: Number of parameters to be used in IFFT for creating the fit.

parameters.name: context_window_size
parameters.description: Centered window of neighbors to consider for the calculation of local outliers' z_scores

parameters.name: local_outlier_threshold
parameters.description: Outlier threshold in multiples of sigma for local outliers

parameters.name: max_sign_change_distance
parameters.description: Maximum gap between two closed oppositely signed local outliers to detect a sign change for outlier region grouping.

parameters.name: random_state
parameters.description: Seed for the random number generator
